### isUndefValue() {#a8349c0152a8ece08ab63f6180baa7c8e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::SimplifyQuery::isUndefValue (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V) const</>}>
If CanUseUndef is true, returns whether <code>V</code> is undef.

Otherwise always return false.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/simplifyquery-h/#l00120">120</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/simplifyquery-h">SimplifyQuery.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/instructionsimplify-cpp/#l07352">7352</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/instructionsimplify-cpp">InstructionSimplify.cpp</a>.

### CanUseUndef {#a3b12da4ca5cd8514b068a30f8716db31}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::SimplifyQuery::CanUseUndef = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a></>}>
Controls whether simplifications are allowed to constrain the range of possible values for uses of undef.

If it is false, simplifications are not allowed to assume a particular value for a use of undef for example.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/simplifyquery-h/#l00087">87</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/simplifyquery-h">SimplifyQuery.h</a>.
